20110117010253.000|20110117010255.000|TR0|teens, worshipping Satan, murdering three 
20110117010255.000|20110117010258.000|TR0|8-year-old boys.  That happened right here 
20110117010258.000|20110117010301.000|TR0|back in 1993.  Two of the teens got life 
20110117010301.000|20110117010304.000|TR0|in prison, a third was judged to be so 
20110117010304.000|20110117010307.000|TR0|evil that he was sentenced to die. They've 
20110117010307.000|20110117010310.000|TR0|since become known as the West Memphis 
20110117010310.000|20110117010313.000|TR0|Three--the most talked about case in 
20110117010313.000|20110117010316.000|TR0|Arkansas history.  And now many are saying 
20110117010316.000|20110117010319.000|TR0|that recent DNA evidence may not only set

20110117010325.000|20110117010328.000|TR0|killers like this got it completely wrong.

20110117010622.000|20110117010625.000|TR0|MATTINGLY (voice-over):  West Memphis, 
20110117010625.000|20110117010628.000|TR0|Arkansas, 1993.  A small town, blue 
20110117010628.000|20110117010631.000|TR0|collar, steeped in religion, crisscrossed 
20110117010631.000|20110117010634.000|TR0|with truck traffic and interstates.  Just 
20110117010634.000|20110117010637.000|TR0|across the Mississippi from Graceland and 
20110117010637.000|20110117010640.000|TR0|Beale Street in Memphis, Tennessee.  It's 
20110117010640.000|20110117010643.000|TR0|a quiet place most people drive past.  But 
20110117010643.000|20110117010646.000|TR0|it was home for three 8-year-old boys 
20110117010646.000|20110117010649.000|TR0|named Stevie Branch, Christopher Byers, 
20110117010649.000|20110117010652.000|TR0|and Michael Moore.
20110117010652.000|20110117010654.000|TR0|
20110117010654.000|20110117010657.000|TR0|HOBBS:  Stevie and Michael Moore were best 
20110117010657.000|20110117010700.000|TR0|buddies.  Christopher started coming in to 
20110117010700.000|20110117010703.000|TR0|be friends, I'm going to say, about a 
20110117010703.000|20110117010706.000|TR0|month or so before they passed away.  But 
20110117010706.000|20110117010709.000|TR0|it was always Stevie and Michael Moore.  
20110117010709.000|20110117010712.000|TR0|MATTINGLY (voice-over):  On May 5th, 1993, 
20110117010712.000|20110117010715.000|TR0|the three boys went to school, came home, 
20110117010715.000|20110117010718.000|TR0|and went out to play.  Stevie Branch's 
20110117010718.000|20110117010721.000|TR0|mother, Pam Hobbs, remembers it like it 
20110117010721.000|20110117010724.000|TR0|was yesterday.
20110117010724.000|20110117010726.000|TR0|
20110117010726.000|20110117010729.000|TR0|HOBBS:  We wasn't home probably five or 
20110117010729.000|20110117010732.000|TR0|ten minutes when Michael Moore came over 
20110117010732.000|20110117010735.000|TR0|and asked if Stevie could come and go ride 
20110117010735.000|20110117010738.000|TR0|bikes with him. And I was telling him, I 
20110117010738.000|20110117010741.000|TR0|said, "Not today, son.  I'm getting ready 
20110117010741.000|20110117010744.000|TR0|for work, and I'm cooking and all that," 
20110117010744.000|20110117010747.000|TR0|and he and Michael just kept begging and 
20110117010747.000|20110117010750.000|TR0|begging, "Please, let me go, let me go."  
20110117010750.000|20110117010753.000|TR0|So like a lot of parents do, I gave in and

20110117010941.000|20110117010943.000|TR0|husband, Terry, among them.  But Pam held

20110117011004.000|20110117011007.000|TR0|

20110117011018.000|20110117011021.000|TR0|friends, Christopher Byers and Michael

20110117011039.000|20110117011042.000|TR0|

20110117011114.000|20110117011117.000|TR0|
20110117011117.000|20110117011120.000|TR0|MATTINGLY (on-camera):  Satanic killing?  
20110117011120.000|20110117011122.000|TR0|An idea not so farfetched for the time.  
20110117011122.000|20110117011125.000|TR0|This is a community steeped in religion.  
20110117011125.000|20110117011128.000|TR0|A church is never far away.  And it was a 
20110117011128.000|20110117011131.000|TR0|time before the Goth look or the notion of 
20110117011131.000|20110117011134.000|TR0|a romantic teenage vampire became 
20110117011134.000|20110117011137.000|TR0|fashionable.  And this was a crime so 
20110117011137.000|20110117011140.000|TR0|horrendous it was easy to believe it was 
20110117011140.000|20110117011143.000|TR0|committed by a monster.

20110117011146.000|20110117011149.000|TR0|MATTINGLY (on-camera):  When you're

20110117011152.000|20110117011155.000|TR0|your mind?
20110117011155.000|20110117011157.000|TR0|
20110117011157.000|20110117011200.000|TR0|HOBBS:  Exactly the same thing, that 
20110117011200.000|20110117011203.000|TR0|that's what happened.  That the devil 
20110117011203.000|20110117011206.000|TR0|actually come and got my baby.  Everybody 
20110117011206.000|20110117011209.000|TR0|was a suspect.  I would have thought you 
20110117011209.000|20110117011212.000|TR0|did it back then.  I mean, anybody I 
20110117011212.000|20110117011215.000|TR0|looked at I was mad at.  I went into a 
20110117011215.000|20110117011218.000|TR0|world of my own and I hated people.
20110117011218.000|20110117011221.000|TR0|
20110117011221.000|20110117011224.000|TR0|MATTINGLY (voice-over):  Damien Echols 
20110117011224.000|20110117011227.000|TR0|tells me he was also in his own world.  
20110117011227.000|20110117011230.000|TR0|Just beginning, he says, to hear about the 
20110117011230.000|20110117011232.000|TR0|three young boys found in West Memphis.
20110117011232.000|20110117011235.000|TR0|
20110117011235.000|20110117011238.000|TR0|REPORTER:  Investigators found the 
20110117011238.000|20110117011241.000|TR0|children beaten to death.
20110117011241.000|20110117011244.000|TR0|
20110117011244.000|20110117011247.000|TR0|MATTINGLY (on-camera):  Do you remember 
20110117011247.000|20110117011250.000|TR0|the first time you heard about this murder?
20110117011250.000|20110117011253.000|TR0|

20110117013900.000|20110117013903.000|TR0|
20110117013903.000|20110117013906.000|TR0|MATTINGLY:  Mara Leveritt wrote the 
20110117013906.000|20110117013909.000|TR0|"Devil's Knot: The True Story of the West 
20110117013909.000|20110117013912.000|TR0|Memphis Three."   She questions the 
20110117013912.000|20110117013915.000|TR0|strength of the prosecution's case.
20110117013915.000|20110117013918.000|TR0|
20110117013918.000|20110117013921.000|TR0|LEVERITT:  They had very little to go on 
20110117013921.000|20110117013924.000|TR0|and to present to the jury. And so they 
20110117013924.000|20110117013927.000|TR0|made the decision they were going to say 
20110117013927.000|20110117013930.000|TR0|that this was an occult slaying and that's 
20110117013930.000|20110117013932.000|TR0|why it all happened, because these guys
